fields.description:
As one of the engineering week decisions, we will move the iOS-only {{Ti.UI.iOS.LivePhotoView}} core-component to an own module in 7.0.0 and deprecate the core-component to remove it from the core in 8.0.0. The following API's are part of this compontent and will be deprecated / moved as well:
* Ti.UI.iOS.AnchorAttachmentBehavior
* Ti.UI.iOS.CollisionBehavior
* Ti.UI.iOS.DynamicItemBehavior
* Ti.UI.iOS.GravityBehavior
* Ti.UI.iOS.PushBehavior
* Ti.UI.iOS.SnapBehavior
* Titanium.UI.iOS.ViewAttachmentBehavior
fields.summary: iOS: Deprecate Ti.UI.iOS.Animator, move to own module "Ti.Animator"
